sections.title: Description
sections.raw_content:
This unit contains the predefined constants for manipulating strings.

Several routines in the Str module are exported unqualified.
sections.text_content:
This unit contains the predefined constants for manipulating strings.
          Several routines in the Str module are exported unqualified.
sections.mdown_content:
This unit contains the predefined constants for manipulating strings.

Several routines in the Str module are exported unqualified.

sections.title: Entry Points
sections.raw_content:
Lower   Convert a string to lower case.
Upper   Convert a string to upper case.
Trim   Remove leading and trailing blanks.
index   Finds a specified string in another string.
length   Returns the length of a string.
repeat   Creates a string by repeating a specified string a number of times.
sections.text_content: Lower Convert a string to lower case.Upper Convert a string to upper case.Trim Remove leading and trailing blanks.index Finds a specified string in another string.length Returns the length of a string.repeat Creates a string by repeating a specified string a number of times.

[**length**](length.html)   Returns the length of a string.  
[**repeat**](repeat.html)   Creates a string by repeating a specified string a number of times.
